=== Find Your Latitude & Longitude ===

''With thanks to the authors of the <nowiki>[[http://www.debian.org/devel/developers.loc|Debian Developer Locations Map]]</nowiki>!''

* Coordinates of places all around the world, with exact maps for USA, Canada and most of Europe: http://www.multimap.com/ (put in your address for accuracy!)
* <nowiki>[[http://geocoder.ibegin.com/|iBegin Geocoder]]</nowiki> - Find coordinates for US/Canadian address
* <nowiki>[[http://geocoder.ca/|Geocoder.ca]]</nowiki> Find your coordinates from any Canadian address or postal code
* <nowiki>[[http://www.geocoder.us/|Geocoder.us]]</nowiki> - Find coordinates for US address
* Getty Thesaurus of Geographic Names: http://www.getty.edu/research/tools/vocabulary/tgn/
* Good starting point: http://www.ckdhr.com/dns-loc/finding.html
* GPS locations for airports: http://www.airnav.com/
* Australian database: http://www.ga.gov.au/map/names/
* Canadian database: http://geonames.nrcan.gc.ca/search/search_e.php
* another site which shows coordinates bottom left: http://www.maporama.com/share/
* Find coordinates of place names in New Zealand: http://www.linz.govt.nz/rcs/linz/pub/web/root/core/Placenames/SearchPlaceNames/searchplacenames/index.jsp
* Convert Latitude/Longitude in Degrees/Minutes/Seconds to/from Decimal: http://www.fcc.gov/mb/audio/bickel/DDDMMSS-decimal.html

=== Other Ubuntu Maps ===

http://map.ubuntu-be.org/nl and http://map.ubuntu-be.org/fr - Ubuntu volunteers in Belgium

http://www.frappr.com/ubuntu/ - A map of Ubuntu users around the world (Using Google Maps)

http://www.ubuntu-fr.org/carte/ - A map of French-speaking users thanks to the Google Maps API

http://www.ubuntuusers.de/map.php - A map of many German-speaking users

http://www.ubuntu-nl.org/kaart/ - An overview of where the Dutch Ubuntu-users are located

http://www.ubuntu-qc.org/MembersMap - Ubuntu users in the province of Québec, Canada

http://wiki.ubuntubrasil.org/UbunterosNoBrasil - A map of Ubuntu users in Brazil

http://www.ubuntu-pt.org/mapa/map.html - A map of Ubuntu users in Portugal and the type of support they are willing to give.

http://www.ubuntu-se.org/drupal/map/user - A map of Ubuntu users in Sweden.

http://linux.dootzky.com/ A map uf Linux users in Serbia
